name: Keith O`Connor
personality: dependable, serious, and a bit reserved
story: Joshua Thompson grew up in a military family and aspired to follow in his father's footsteps. After completing basic training and proving himself as a skilled marksman, Joshua joined the BLUFOR forces as an autorifleman. He takes his job very seriously and is known for always being dependable in the heat of battle. Though he can come across as a bit reserved, Joshua is deeply loyal to his fellow soldiers and cares deeply for his wife and two young children at home.
